dict.string: tell application "Brave Browser" to open location "chrome-extension://jlgkpaicikihijadgifklkbpdajbkhjo/options.html"
tell application "Brave Browser" to open location "brave://flags"

if application "Brave Browser" is running then tell application "Brave Browser" set theURL to URL of active tab of front window make new window with properties {mode:"incognito"} activate set URL of active tab of front window to theURL end tell else display notification with title ("Brave not running") end if
tell application "Brave Browser" to open location "brave://extensions/"
tell application "Brave Browser" to open location "brave://adblock/"

-- based on https://gist.github.com/dongyuwei/a1c9d67e4af6bbbd999c -- and on https://ldstephens.medium.com/use-alfred-to-launch-safari-url-in-chrome-b609cdc18f21
tell application "System Events" to set frontApp to name of first process whose frontmost is true
if (frontApp = "Safari") then tell application "Safari" set currentTabUrl to URL of front document end tell tell application "Brave Browser" open location (currentTabUrl) activate end tell end if
if (frontApp = "Brave Browser") then tell application "Brave Browser" set currentTabUrl to URL of active tab of front window end tell tell application "Safari" open location (currentTabUrl) activate end tell end if
if (frontApp ‚â† "Brave Browser") and (frontApp ‚â† "Safari") then display notification ("neither Brave nor Safari active") with title ("No Browser Switch") beep end if
tell application "Brave Browser" to open location "brave://downloads"
tell application "Brave Browser" to open location "brave://extensions/shortcuts"
tell application "Brave Browser" to open location "brave://bookmarks"
tell application "Brave Browser" to open location "brave://history/"
tell application "System Events" tell process "Brave Browser" set frontmost to true click menu item "Task Manager" of menu "Window" of menu bar 1 end tell end tell

tell application "Brave Browser" to activate tell application "System Events" to keystroke "c" using {command down} delay 0.1 -- puts the app back into the foreground where the trigger has been activated -- note: alfreds focused-app-variable passes not an app name, but the app-id, therefore the keyword "id" has to be added here. set focusedapp_id to (system attribute "focusedapp") tell application id focusedapp_id to activate --copies title, URL, and selection based on https://gist.github.com/dongyuwei/a1c9d67e4af6bbbd999c tell application "Brave Browser" set currentTabUrl to URL of active tab of front window set currentTabTitle to title of active tab of front window end tell --alfred previously stored the selection in Brave to the clipboard set BraveSelection to (the clipboard as text) --defines cases of what to return set markdown to (system attribute "markdown") if BraveSelection ‚â† "" then set selectionExisting to true if BraveSelection = "" then set selectionExisting to false if selectionExisting and markdown = "yes" then return "> " & BraveSelection & " \n" & "[" & currentTabTitle & "](" & currentTabUrl & ")" if selectionExisting and markdown = "no" then return "\"" & BraveSelection & "\"" & " " & currentTabTitle & " " & currentTabUrl if selectionExisting and markdown = "slack" then return ">" & BraveSelection & " " & currentTabUrl if not selectionExisting and markdown = "yes" then return "[" & currentTabTitle & "](" & currentTabUrl & ")" if not selectionExisting and markdown = "no" then return currentTabTitle & " " & currentTabUrl if not selectionExisting and markdown = "slack" then return currentTabTitle & " " & currentTabUrl

# cannot by "Copy to Clipboard" action, since an empty text field would instead replace it with the passed query
echo -n '' | pbcopy

# move bookmarks mkdir -p ~'/Library/Application Support/Google/Chrome/Default' cp ~'/Library/Application Support/BraveSoftware/Brave-Browser/Default/Bookmarks' ~'/Library/Application Support/Google/Chrome/Default/Bookmarks'
# this file is needed as Alfred uses it to verify the existence of Chrome cp ~'/Library/Application Support/BraveSoftware/Brave-Browser/Local State' ~'/Library/Application Support/Google/Chrome/Local State'
# move history (used by Searchlink) cp ~'/Library/Application Support/BraveSoftware/Brave-Browser/Default/History' ~'/Library/Application Support/Google/Chrome/Default/History'
# open up Alfred again osascript -e "tell application \"Alfred 4\" to search"

-- requires: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/picture-in-picture-extens/hkgfoiooedgoejojocmhlaklaeopbecg/
tell application "System Events" keystroke "p" using {control down} set frontApp to (name of first process where it is frontmost) if (frontapp is "app_mode_loader") then delay 0.2 keystroke "h" using {command down} end if end tell
tell application "Brave Browser" quit repeat until (application "Brave Browser" is not running) delay 0.5 end repeat delay 1 activate end tell
Copy the Title and URL of *all* tabs
